description: Request for Standing Offer for the acquisition of Boxed Lunches in Quebec, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
=================
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

 E6MON-23PQPR - RMSO - Boxed Lunches

### English Title
	* Packaged combination meals

### French Title
	* Repas complèts sous emballage

## Reference Information

* Reference Number: WS3954769898
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS3954769898
* Publication Date: 2023-04-11
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-11T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-04-12
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-05-31

## Tender Details

* Tender Status: Expiration (Expired)
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d'offre à commandes)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contracting Entity

* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Points of Contact

*   Name: Andy Doucette (il-lui / he-him)
*   Email: [andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Addtionnal Information
